data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 610,500 citizens of the the state of Upper West.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Upper West, Ghana
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 158,065 believers in Upper West, Ghana how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary: On average, 76 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Upper West, Ghana.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Upper West, Ghana a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 158,065 believers in Upper West to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Fulani, Maasina people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Upper West hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Upper West to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 158,065 believers in Upper West.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

location.name: Upper West
location.people_groups_list: Kabiye, Hausa, Sisaala, Pasaale, Kantosi, Kasem
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kabiye (47,000), Hausa (296,000), Sisaala, Pasaale (57,000), Kantosi (3,600), Kasem (181,000)
